RelatedSentence: Hamburg Inn No. 2 owner Dave Panther said the iconic Iowa City eatery likely will be closed at least a few weeks while damages caused by a Sunday morning fire are repaired .
Hamburg Inn No. 2 owner Dave Panther said the iconic Iowa City eatery likely will be closed at least a few weeks while damages caused by a Sunday morning fire are repaired .
The Iowa Fire Department responded to the restaurant , 214 N. Linn St. , at 1:11 a.m. Sunday .
Crews encountered heavy smoke in the first floor of the two - story structure , then put out a fire in the basement .
Crews encountered heavy smoke in the first floor of the two - story structure , then put out a fire in the basement .
In addition to serving pie shakes and breakfast all day , the restaurant has made a name for itself as a popular campaign stop for politicians .
Hamburg Inn has played host to presidents Ronald Reagan and Bill Clinton , then - Senator Barack Obama and many others seeking national political office .
Hamburg Inn has played host to presidents Ronald Reagan and Bill Clinton , then - Senator Barack Obama and many others seeking national political office .
Fire Marshal Brian Greer said it 's too early to tell what caused the fire .
Investigators were wrapping up interviews on Monday and hoped to determine a cause by midweek .
Investigators were wrapping up interviews on Monday and hoped to determine a cause by midweek .
Investigators were wrapping up interviews on Monday and hoped to determine a cause by midweek .
Greer noted it 's not always possible to pinpoint what started a fire .
We can always find the area of origin , but sometimes the cause eludes us ,  Greer said .
We can always find the area of origin , but sometimes the cause eludes us ,  Greer said .
We can always find the area of origin , but sometimes the cause eludes us ,  Greer said .
Panther said the blaze started near the washer and dryer in the building 's basement , but he is n't sure either appliance caused the fire .
Panther said the blaze started near the washer and dryer in the building 's basement , but he is n't sure either appliance caused the fire .
Where that was located , that 's where the real heat was ,  Panter said , speculating that spontaneous combustion could be the culprit in the blaze .

Panther said the fire destroyed appliances in the basement , including the washer and dryer , water softener , hot - water heater and ice machine .
Panther said the fire destroyed appliances in the basement , including the washer and dryer , water softener , hot - water heater and ice machine .
Beams took on damage , as did the dining room floor .
The fire took out most of the plumbing and electrical wiring in the basement , as well as wiring running up to the dining area .
Some smoke reached the dining room and second floor apartments , Panther said .
Some smoke reached the dining room and second floor apartments , Panther said .
In addition to replacing the plumbing and electrical work and cleaning up anything that was smoked damaged , Panther said he 'll have to replace a portion of the dining room floor .
In addition to replacing the plumbing and electrical work and cleaning up anything that was smoked damaged , Panther said he 'll have to replace a portion of the dining room floor .
The fire comes on the heels of what Panther said was the best week ever at the restaurant and one of the eatery 's best times of the year .
A transformer failed during the fire , knocking out power to neighboring businesses , including IC Ugly 's and Oasis Falafel , but Panther said power had been restored to those businesses .
A transformer failed during the fire , knocking out power to neighboring businesses , including IC Ugly 's and Oasis Falafel , but Panther said power had been restored to those businesses .
Panther said he 'll take this opportunity to redo the wallpaper and update some of the memorabilia , such as replacing faded photos and switching from black - and - white pictures to color photos .

Firefighters have estimated the cost of the fire to be approximately $ 30,000 .
A fire in 1994 closed the business for three months , Panther said .
